title: Gloamryn
description: A mystical strategy game set in a world of eternal twilight.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Welcome to Gloamryn!
<!--text-->
A mystical strategy game set in a world of eternal twilight, where survival is as much about cunning as it is about strength.

In this land of fading light, resources are scarce, enemies lurk in the shadows, and magic pulses through the earth itself.
Build camps, gather supplies, and master the art of tactical combat as you lead your people through the unknown.
Will you seek refuge under the glowing leaves of the Healing Tree, strike dangerous bargains with witches, or carve your own path in the twilight?

The choices are yours â€“ welcome to Gloamryn.

<!--image-->
![Gloamryn-12rps](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/cf84b4df97f34ef28673ef349642ed6d/gloamryn-12rps.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Tactical Combat - A Unique Card Game
<!--text-->
Tactical combat in Gloamryn takes place through a unique, specifically designed card game. Your units, their equipment, and their abilities shape every battle, while each faction brings its own way of fighting. No two encounters play out the same.

<!--image-->
![Gloamryn-nxgd9](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/cf84b4df97f34ef28673ef349642ed6d/gloamryn-nxgd9.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Strategic Map
<!--text-->
A large strategic map to explore. A procedurally generated world for great replayability. Turn-based movement with countless encounters and places to visit, offering endless possibilities.

<!--image-->
![Gloamryn-1n1fr](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/cf84b4df97f34ef28673ef349642ed6d/gloamryn-1n1fr.png)

<!--image-->
![Gloamryn-7jd7u](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/cf84b4df97f34ef28673ef349642ed6d/gloamryn-7jd7u.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Survival and Growth
<!--text-->
Gather resources, craft equipment and perform magic rituals. Set up camps or establish a settlement. Accumulate wealth and improve your chances of survival in this dark world.

<!--image-->
![Gloamryn-j86mf](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/cf84b4df97f34ef28673ef349642ed6d/gloamryn-j86mf.png)

<!--image-->
![Gloamryn-14b21](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/cf84b4df97f34ef28673ef349642ed6d/gloamryn-14b21.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Trade and Economy
<!--text-->
People of Gloamryn would not survive without trade, and neither will you. Throughout the land, town markets, wandering merchants, and trade posts offer trade opportunities - you just have to find them.

<!--image-->
![Gloamryn-18vai](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/cf84b4df97f34ef28673ef349642ed6d/gloamryn-18vai.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Your Story
<!--text-->
Follow the main campaign, take on side quests, or carve your own path in free play. A great adventure awaits in Gloamryn, the world of eternal twilight.
